short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Apple TV Program Search Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Apple TV Web Player Search Extension. Search & play movies,TV shows, 
web series and exclusive content in Apple TV Web Player using specialized Google site search directly from chrome omnibox (search box).
This is Apple TV Program search that allows the user seamlessly search genre, release date, actors, and more while surfing the web by navigating to the Apple TV Web Player Search user interface. 

How to Use
1.First of all, open Apple TV Web Player (https://tv.apple.com/). Always remain logged in to search and play movies, webseries seamlessly directly from chrome omni box(search or url box).
2. Now you can click extension icon to launch search or use omnibox and type "ATS" enter 'TAB' key and type to search the program of your choice.
3. When you find the movies , tv show or web series you were looking for just click the link.
4. If you are already logged into Apple TV you will be able to play it asap else you will be asked to log in.
5. Enjoy searching movies on Apple TV™ for free!

To provide this functionality extension takes over you default search for seamless experience..

Apple TV™ and its related trademarks, names, and logos are the property of Apple, Inc. The Extension is not affiliated with, sponsored, or endorsed by Apple. All other trademarks, names, and logos used in the Extension are the property of their respective owners.
